## Methodology

SES is constructed by using PCA.

## Preprocess of the data

transforming the absolute frequencies into proportions on the basis of the resident population of the block. In this way the census variables were converted into composite variables.

```{r}
65*12.2/100
```

```{r}

```

